traits.Blood Frenzy: The abomination has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Limited Amphibiousness: The abomination can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.
traits.Water Breathing: The abomination can breathe only underwater.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
